name: Women's Cleanline Synergy 5/4 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Unique only to Cleanline Surf is the Billabong Women's Cleanline Synergy 5/4 back zip wetsuit. The Nobel Prize-winning Graphene material is placed in the chest and back liner, which warms up quickly and has heat-producing properties to stay comfortable while waiting for the next set to come through. Partially recycled Superlight Foam neoprene has a soft buttery feel while maintaining an impressive flexible feel. Non-toxic Superflex tape and glued and blind-stitched external seams result in good flex from head to toe. Climb in the easy-to-use back zip entry and sprint out to the water in no time without breaking the bank.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Exterior Fabric Type: PRO STRETCH! 100% Recycled
Eco-Conscious Fabric: Cotton polyester pro stretch softer, lighter, recycled blend
Neoprene Foam Type: Superlight Foam, Partially recycled
Interior Fabric Type: Graphene combined with Silicon Stretch
Sleeves: Long
Entry System / Zip: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Exterior Seam Detail: GBS
Internal Seam Detail: High stress point reinforced melco spot tape
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: ABYW100208
PRODUCT FEATURES
Women's Long Sleeve Full Wetsuit
Glued and blindstiched seams
Fully taped and sealed internal seams
ADDITIONAL INFO

PRO STRETCH RECYCLER
New improved soft silicone stretch jersey made using 100% recycled fibers. The 100% recycled stretch neoprene nylon blend exterior fabric fibers in the Billabong Pro Stretch jerseys maximize sustainability and stretch where you need it most.

SMART FOAM
Superior thermal retention, made using partially recycled, Premium light weight materials. SMART Foam limestone-based with 30% recycled car tires, scrap rubber & oyster shells.

SUPERLIGHT FOAM
Partially recycled, upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps combine to create great thermal retention with a high-stretch combination.

GRAPHENE
The warmth and performance of Nobel prize-winning Graphene is heat-generating material infused and combined with Silicone Stretch — 100% recycled fibers. Graphene-infused yarns warm up faster and hold heat longer.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

SUPER-FLEX NEO TAPE
The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

AQUA ALPHA
Aqua Alpha water-based non-toxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

The Billabong × Cleanline Women's Synergy 5/4 Full Wetsuit delivers lightweight, premium heat and innovative technology with superior value and durability. Made from stretchy and eco-conscious Superlight neoprene combined with glued and blind stitched sealed external seams, the women’s wetsuit boasts excellent thermal retention. Graphene recycler lining at the front and back panels adds incredible strength and heat without adding bulk, while silicone stretch panels at the arms and legs let you get in and out with ease. Finished with a back zip entry, the 5/4 Synergy Full Wetsuit delivers everything you demand from a premium wetsuit, without breaking the bank. Featuring the Cleanline logo screen printed on the back!

name: Women's Hyperfreak 5.5/4+ Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Cleanline Staff
Sophia Says:

"This suit stands up to the hype. It truly is the most flexible, comfortable suit on the market. The TBX3 technology is unmatched and feels smooth with every paddle. I feel like I don’t miss a beat in this wetsuit and have more technical ability when I’m surfing. If you’re looking for maximum flexibility in a 5/4 suit, this is it."

The O'Neill Women's Hyperfreak 5.5/4+ Chest Zip Hooded Wetsuit is the most performance-oriented wetsuit made for women. The suit is constructed with super light TechnoButter 3 in the legs and torso and TB3X neoprene in the arms and shoulders. This allows for maximum paddle ability and minimal weight, two critical factors concerning cold water wetsuits. The minimal seam design, overall lightweight, quality construction, and attention to detail make this a favorite among women who love surfing in cold water.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5.5/4+mm
Full Body/Legs: TechnoButter 3
Arms/Shoulders: TechnoButter 3X
Sleeves: Long
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: 5478
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E. Closure
Minimal Seam Design
360° Barrier with Drain Holes
TB3X Fully Taped Seams
Glued and Blind Stitched Seams
PLUS (+) = 0.5mm Extra thickness for even more warmth
Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination
ADDITIONAL INFO

O'Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells in place of calcium carbonate powder which comprises approximately 10% of their neoprene. O’Neill worked with their key manufacturing partner to develop a non-solvent based lamination glue called “aqua-alpha”. Aqua alpha reduces solvent usage by 600 grams per wetsuit compared to traditional laminating glues. Eliminates harmful VOCs and has the same durability as conventional, solvent-based Wetsuit glues. From recycled polybags to 100% recycled paper and soy based inks hang tags. Conserving water, energy and virgin materials. 100% digital catalogs. Dope-dying infusion produces colored yarns without the dyeing process. This saves tremendous amounts of water while reducing energy consumption and water pollution (up to 80%). 26% carbon emission is reduced for every kg of fabric. Carbon black is one of the key ingredients in neoprene. It can now be carbonized from scrap rubber tires using high heat to extract. 72% carbon emission declined. O’Neill’s advanced repair facility prolongs the life cycle of their product, keeping their wetsuit out of the landfill longer.



PRODUCT CONSTRUCTION

TECHNOBUTTER 3
O’Neill’s exclusive, maximum stretch, hydrophobic neoprene with featherlight ENVY foam rubber core. Ultimate warmth and comfort. Built to last.

TECHNOBUTTER 3X
O’Neill’s exclusive new pre-stretched neoprene with featherlight, ENVY foam rubber core. The lightest, most flexible, softest material ever created. Superior flexibility and fit.



MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

The HyperFreak F.U.Z.E. (Chest Zip) is constructed with super light TechnoButter 3 and TB3X neoprene. The minimal seam design, lightweight, quality construction, and attention to detail make this another team inspired favorite.



VIDEO

name: Women's Synergy 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Keep your performance at its peak in cold water with the Billabong Women’s 5/4 Synergy Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit. Made from stretchy Superflex Jersey and eco-friendly materials, this full wetsuit features strategically placed seams and advanced construction techniques to ensure warmth without compromising on movement capability. Heat is also maximized through graphene recycler lining across front and back panels as well as added reinforcement of glued blind stitched high-stress areas plus an easy chest zip entry for seamless transitions.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: Superlight Foam
Exterior Fabric: PRO STRETCH! 100% Recycled
Interior Fabric: Graphene combined with Silicone Stretch
Exterior Seams: GBS
Interior Seams: Superflex Neo tape
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Sleeves: Long
Hood: Attached
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style Number: ABJW200100
PRODUCT FEATURES
Best Value and Performance Option
Women's Long Sleeve Full Hooded Wetsuit
Synergy Wetsuit Series
Taped Internal Seams
Glued and Blindstitched seams
100% Recycled Fibers In and out
ADDITIONAL INFO

PRO STRETCH
New Improved stretch, 100% recycled fibers. Recycled pro stretch neoprene nylon blend exterior fabric.

SMART FOAM
Superior thermal retention, made using partially recycled, Premium light weight materials. SMART Foam limestone-based with 30% recycled car tires, scrap rubber & oyster shells.

GRAPHENE
The warmth and performance of Nobel prize-winning Graphene is heat-generating material infused and combined with Silicone Stretch — 100% recycled fibers. Graphene-infused yarns warm up faster and hold heat longer.

GRAPHENE RECYLCER +
Warmth and Performance of Graphene. Infused with 100% recycled fibers lining the entire interior of the suit.

SUPERFLEX RECYCLER +
100% recycled fibers, combined with Superlight foam is lightweight, eco-friendly and provides great thermal retention with 20% increased stretch.

SUPERLIGHT FOAM
Partially recycled, upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps combine to create great thermal retention with a high-stretch combination.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

SUPER-FLEX NEO TAPE
The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

AQUA ALPHA
Aqua Alpha water-based nontoxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Engineered quality, the 5/4 Synergy Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit is made to maximize performance in cold weather environments. The women's full wetsuit is made from stretchy and eco-conscious recycled Superflex Jersey, built with strategically placed seams, high-end materials, and advanced construction techniques. Graphene recycler lining at the front and back panels adds incredible strength and heat without adding bulk. Details include durable glued and blind stitched seams reinforced with internal taping at high stress areas and a chest zip entry for easy on and off.

name: Women's Syncro 5/4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
There’s a reason the Roxy Women’s Syncro 5/4/3 Back Zip wetsuit is a top seller at Cleanline Surf; it packs in everything needed in a cold water suit at an affordable price. With the eco-friendly StretchFlight 2 neoprene combined with the WarmFlight thermal fleece liner, the Syncro maintains flexibility, warmth, and a comfortable feel while hanging 10 on your favorite longboard. The seams stay watertight and hold in the heat through the use of StretchFlight 3 Taping and glued and blind stitched external seams.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4/3mm
Neoprene: StretchFlight 2
Internal Lining: WarmFlight thermal fleece
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Knee Pads: Supratex
Model Year: 2021/2022
Materials: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Elastane
Manufacturer's Part Number: ERJW103084
PRODUCT FEATURES
Increased warmth and comfort without sacrificing flexibility
Thermal Smoothie durable textured neoprene, retains heat and blocks wind [chest and back]
24% less CO2 emissions per wetsuit
Limestone-derivate eco-friendly neoprene made from scrap rubber tires and Bluesign® certified
Lining keeps body heat in and water out [chest]
Triple glued and blind stitched [GBS] seams reduce sew-throughs and water entry
StretchFlight 3 Taped internal seals makes all seams watertight
Water-based glue used for lamination
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
Back zip entry system with YKK® 10 plastic zip
Knee pads durable, lightweight and flexible
Glideskin neck seal
Hydrowrap x2 adjustable neck closure with hydrosheild water barrier
Print placement may differ from one wetsuit to another
Product appearance may differ slightly depending on print placement
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

Be a true ROXY surfer with the 5/4/3mm Syncro Back Zip Wetsuit for women. Crafted with recycled StretchFlight 2 neoprene and WarmFlight® thermal fleece lining to keep you flexible yet warm as possible, so the cold water is no match for you. The triple GBS seams and StretchFlight 3 tape seals work together to prevent as much water entry as possible while you confidently and comfortably shred like never before.

name: Women's Dawn Patrol 5/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Rip Curl has some of the best women riders on their team so its no surprise that their suits offer unparalleled warmth and stretch in designs that keep you strong and confident in the water. The Rip Curl Women's Dawn Patrol 5/3 Back Zip Wetsuit is a great entry-level wetsuit for its combined performance features of warmth and durability and the back zip entry system is slightly easier than a chest zip if you're new to getting in and out of a wetsuit. This model also includes a batwing system providing a barrier between back zip and body to minimize leakage and flushing.

This wetsuit has many of hte high end features of Rip Curls Ultimate suits including E5 Flash Lining, E5 neoprene, and E4 Thermoflex Lining. The large front and back panels of E5 flash lining is the world's fastest drying. This paired with the E4 Thermo will keep you warm and comfortable. High stress areas are secured with E5 tape to keep you as confident in the long term durability of the suit as you are comfortable in the water.

DETAILS
Thickness: 5/3mm
Neoprene: E5
Internal Lining: E5 Flash Lining and E4 Thermo
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: WSM9PW
PRODUCT FEATURES
Premium E5 neoprene is lightweight and provides 10% more warmth than E4 with 30% more stretch and is 20% lighter
Performance high stretch E5 tape is applied to high stress areas covering 3/4 of the seams for increased strength and durability
Front and back panels of E5 Flash lining are fast drying, warm, and hihg-stretch
E4 Thermo lining provides warmth and is high stretch
Easy back zip entry system with an adjustable collar and a water resistant offset steel head zipper with urethane coating
Batwing system keeps you comfortable separating the back zip from your body while also preventing leakage and flushing
Highly waterproof triple glued and blindstitched seams that are stretchy and comfortable
E5 tape on high stress points

name: Women's Seven Seas 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Brave the icy cold swell while staying cozy warm in the Sisstrevolution Women’s Seven Seas 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip wetsuit. Soft and flexible to the touch, the 100% Super Stretch Japanese neoprene is super comfortable to help prolong those epic sessions. Don’t sweat if you run cold; the Fever Fiber internal liner, smoothy panels, and Super Stretch Neo 3.0 taped seams all contribute to creating a toasty warm suit. The female-specific tailored fit ensures the most comfortable fit resulting in optimal movement from head to toe.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: 100% Super Stretch Japanese limestone based
Internal Lining: Fever Fiber
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached Hood
Key Pocket: Key Cord
Knee Pads: Yes
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturer's Part Number: GN7S54HC
PRODUCT FEATURES
Chest-zip entry, minimal bulk with contoured water tight design
Triple glued, blind stitched seams
Sisstr super stretch Neo 3.0 tape allows for maximum seam sealing while having unrestricted stretch and comfort
Smoothy Panels - Wind & water-repellent - Smoothy panels on the back acts as a barrier against the cold where it's needed the most
Knee pad, Upcycled Supratex abrasion resistant for flexibility and strength
Liquid tape cuff seals to prevent flushing at cuffs
Glideskin on the hood seals to skin to prevent flushing
Dope Dyed Fabric
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

WARMTH & STRETCH
Everything you need in a hooded chest zip wetsuit and nothing you don't. Using 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene — lighter, warmer, softer, stretchier, and easier to put on and take off. Allows for more freedom of movement. Feel protected against the cold with the full body Thermal lining. Sisstrevolution's Fever Fiber lining offers more stretch, insulates heat, and dries incredibly fast. Eco Fiber stretch thermal in the legs for warmth and movement. A softer, eco-friendly, anti-fade stretch jersey laminated with AquaA eco-friendly water-based lamination is completely solvent free. Made by Bluesign approved mills. The Sisstre suit is a tailored fit — anatomically correct, engineered body lines and minimal seams for unrestricted warmth and performance. Stay comfortable out on the water time and time again with the Women's Seven (7) Seas 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit.

name: Women's R4 Yulex 5.5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
This 5.5mm/4mm cold-water wetsuit features all-new updates including ease of entry and a new fit. The suit’s designed to slip on fast, which you’ll be thankful for because if you are wearing this suit, it’s likely pretty cold. Patagonia’s Women’s R4® Yulex® Hooded Front-Zip is a wetsuit that’ll keep you warm and, in the water, longer, even when the temp drops below 40 drips (Fahrenheit, that is).

Patagonia’s wetsuit line has been completely redesigned this season. The new suits feature an updated patterning across the back shoulder seam for ease of motion while paddling; a wider, lower-profile internal seam tape for utmost comfort; new 100% recycled, ultra-soft polyester arm and leg linings that saves 18 water bottles per suit; 100% recycled spandex in the external and internal thermal linings; AQUAa water-based glue; and, solution-dyed linings. They’re still constructed from a neoprene-free blend of 85% Yulex® natural rubber from sources that are FSC® certified by the Rainforest Alliance (meaning the forest of hevea trees––the source of the rubber––doesn’t come from a newly cut rainforest) and 15% synthetic rubber by polymer content. All Patagonia’s wetsuits are Fair Trade Certified™ sewn (the only Fair Trade Certified™ wetsuits in the industry, by the way).

DETAILS
Thickness: 5.5/4mm
Neoprene: Yulex Natural Rubber/Synthetic Rubber
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: None
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: 88527
PRODUCT FEATURES
Made with neoprene-free Yulex; natural rubber/chlorine-free synthetic rubber that meets rigorous standards for performance, durability, warmth and sustainability
Torso/thighs: 4.5mm of 85% Yulex pure natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber
Arms/legs: 3.5mm of 85% Yulex pure natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber
Hood: 3.5mm of 85% Yulex pure natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber
Torso/thighs/hood have solution-dyed 95% polyester (51% recycled)/5% spandex inverted microgrid thermal lining that minimizes weight, dries fast and offers excellent flexibility
Solution-dyed, high-stretch 100% recycled polyester jersey lining in the arms/legs improves flexibility and dry time; solution-dyed exterior face fabric made with 85% recycled polyester/15% spandex is durable, stretchy and water-resistant. Lining and face fabric laminated with solvent-free AquaA glue
100% external seam sealing; all seams are triple glued and internally taped
Supratex kneepads and ankle cuffs for maximum durability and anatomic fit
Floating, asymmetrical front-zip with corrosion-proof Salmi® zipper provides better seal and extends suit’s lifespan; unlike other designs, zipper is replaceable. Adjustable hood opening with cord lock; easy-access key loop
Adjustable hood opening with cord lock; easy-access key loop
Made in a Fair Trade Certified facility
Made in Thailand
1406 g (49.6 oz)

name: Women's Prologue 5/4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
With the latest wetsuit technology in mind, the women’s back zip Prologue Collection is a surf essential. A sporty blend of FREEMAX neoprene and HYPERSTRETCH 3.0 make the Women’s Prologue 5/4/3 a stretchy and comfortable option. The Triple glued & single -blind stitched seams penetrate neoprene to reduce water entry and improve durability. The Prologue 5/4/3 includes a back zip entry with a YKK #10 plastic zipper. Lightweight Supertex Knee pads are also implemented into the Roxy Prologue for protection and performance.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4/3mm
Neoprene: FREEMAX & HYPERSTRETCH 3.0
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Materials: 83% Nylon, 17% Elastane
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: ERJW103073
PRODUCT FEATURES
FREEMAX neoprene on body & legs with HYPERSTRETCH 3.0 on arms & lower leg
GBS (glued and blind stitched) seams for maximum flexibility and minimal water entry
Back zip entry with YKK® #10 plastic zipper
Hydrowrap x2 completely adjustable neck closure system for a watertight seal
Supratex knee pads - durable construction made lightweight and flexible for better performance
ADDITIONAL INFO

ROXY considers the use of recycled & naturally sourced materials, water input, energy usage & eco-toxicity in each design choice. ROXY uses Carbon Black, derived from scrap tires to cut down on energy consumption. Saves 200g of Co2 emission/suit. ROXY uses limestone-derived neoprene instead of harmful petrochemical-based options. ROXY reuses neoprene scraps to limit landfill waste. Water-based glue is used as an alternative to eliminate organic solvents that are bad for the environment. ROXY’s internal & external linings are made using recycled poly & nylon to keep plastic out of the ocean & reduce consumption. A natural, recycled and renewable product made from grinding oyster shells replaces limestone and its harmful mining processes.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Crafted from the latest wetsuit technology, this women's back zip wetsuit of the Prologue Collection is a surf essential. The long sleeve design is crafted from a sporty blend of FREEMAX neoprene on the body and legs and HYPERSTRETCH 3.0 on the arms and lower legs for maximum comfort and flexibility. Lightweight Supratex knee pads add another layer of much-needed protection so you can shred like no other. Triple glued & single-blind stitched seams are darned to partially penetrate the neoprene to reduce water entry. An adjustable neck closure system that creates a secure & water-tight seal. Free floating zipper technology with rubber pull, semi auto-locking. Easy to get into and effortless to get out of!

name: Women's 5/4 Dawn Patrol Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Rip Curl Women's Dawn Patrol 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit offers performance and warmth features along with durability and great value. It has many of the high-end features that you would find in Rip Curl's Ultimate wetsuits including all over E5 neoprene which is warmer, lighter and has 30% more stretch than E4. This suit also features front and back panels of quick drying E5 Flash lining paired with E4 Thermoflex lining providing comfortable stretch. For durability E5 tape is added to high-stress points, a major bonus for keeping water out and enforcing the strength and warmth of this high performance wetsuit.

DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: E5
Internal Lining: E5 Flash + E4 Thermoflex
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: WSMYHW
PRODUCT FEATURES
Front and Back panels of E5 Flash lining that funnel water rapidly out of your suit
E5 Neoprene 30% more stretch, 20% lighter, and 10% warmer than E4
E5 Tape added to high stress points for increased strength and durability
E4 Thermoflex combined with E4 neoprene for added stretch and warmth
Easy top-entry chest zip with a lightweight zipper that is low profile and prevents blow outs
Warm and flexible attachd hood

name: Women's Psycho Tech 5.5/4+ Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Stay psyched with the O'Neill Women’s Psycho Tech 5.5/4+ Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit. The women's Psycho Tech 5.5/4 hooded wetsuit ultimately focuses on warmth and durability. The sustainable TB4 Firewall technology from O’Neill retains and recirculates heat. O’Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells and Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination to help reduce product emissions. The Psycho Tech is O’Neill’s premier wetsuit and is loved by enthusiasts for its high-performance technology.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5.5/4mm+
Chest / Back: TB4 Duraskin Air Firewall
Thigh / Butt / Shins / Calf: TB4 Firewall
Arms / Shoulders: TechnoButter 4
Entry: TechnoButter 4X
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: 5508
PRODUCT FEATURES
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Chest Zip)
360 degree Barrier With Drainholes and Anti-Flush Barrier (F.U.Z.E.)
Super Seal Low Profile Cuffs with Plasma Wrist and Ankle Seals
Plasma Wrist and Ankle Seals
Redzone Water Resistant Zipper
Krypto Knee Padz
Recycled Oyster Shells and Eco Carbon Black Infused Neoprene
Recycled Dope-Dyed Yarn Jersey
Aqua Alpha Solvent Free Neoprene Lamination
Key Pocket with Loop
Stitchless Exterior Fluid Seam Weld Technology with Interior Recycled TBX Tape
PLUS (+) = 0.5mm Extra thickness for even more warmth
ADDITIONAL INFO

O'Neill uses recycled ocean oyster shells in place of calcium carbonate powder which comprises approximately 10% of their neoprene. O’Neill worked with their key manufacturing partner to develop a non-solvent based lamination glue called “aqua-alpha”. Aqua alpha reduces solvent usage by 600 grams per wetsuit compared to traditional laminating glues. Eliminates harmful VOCs and has the same durability as conventional, solvent-based Wetsuit glues. From recycled polybags to 100% recycled paper and soy based inks hang tags. Conserving water, energy and virgin materials. 100% digital catalogs. Dope-dying infusion produces colored yarns without the dyeing process. This saves tremendous amounts of water while reducing energy consumption and water pollution (up to 80%). 26% carbon emission is reduced for every kg of fabric. Every blueprint full suit saves more than 1 lb/0.5 kg of harmful plastic from potentially polluting the world’s living oceans. Carbon black is one of the key ingredients in neoprene. It can now be carbonized from scrap rubber tires using high heat to extract. 72% carbon emission declined. O’Neill’s advanced repair facility prolongs the life cycle of their product, keeping their wetsuit out of the landfill longer.



PRODUCT CONSTRUCTION

TB4 AIR FIREWALL
The next great thermal breakthrough was made better with trapped pockets of air. TB4 Air Firewall uses a special lamination process paired with a core of aerated neoprene and a graphene fiber jersey to create the toastiest conditions. Take summer with you.

TB4 FIREWALL
The all new Technobutter 4 Firewall utilizes the recycled graphene fibers at a thicker pile to create a fire hot feedback loop. As the body heat warms the graphene fibers they conduct the heat back into the body.

TECHNOBUTTER 4X
Technobutter 4x goes beyond the gooey stretch, and soft feel of TB3x. Recycled graphene fibers line the jersey allowing for incredible stretch with added strength and warmth retention, all with a new look.

TECHNOBUTTER 4
TB4 builds on the legendary Technobutter 3, the next evolution of the jersey introduces recycled yarns infused with graphene for increased wear strength and heat retention.

MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

O'Neill's Psycho Tech range focuses on ultimate warmth and durability with high-performance recycled materials and water-tight double-sealed stitchless seams. Sustainable TB4 Firewall technology radiates throughout with TB4 Duraskin Air Firewall in the chest and back to shield against the cold while retaining and recirculating your body heat. Designed to keep you in the water longer, toasty, and stoked.

name: Women's Swell Series 5/4/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Paddle out in a breeze after climbing into the all-new Roxy Women’s Swell Series 5/4/3 back zip wetsuit. Zip close the durable YKK 10 plastic zipper while feeling the comfortable Eco sleek WarmFlight internal liner against your skin. Externally, the Eco StretchFlight neoprene is engineered to protect from cold ocean water and features feminine designs on the shoulders and arms. Feel good about the eco-friendly materials that make up the Swell, with the recycled polyester and nylon in the liner and water-based glue used in the seam construction. Look good and feel even better in the Roxy Swell Series.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4/3mm
Fabric: Eco StretchFlight
Thermal Lining: Eco sleek WarmFlight® at bust (front, sides, back) and wrist
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Materials: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Elastane
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style: ERJW103127
PRODUCT FEATURES
GBS glued and blind stitched seams
Xtra-stretch taped at front, back and top legs
Water based glue used for lamination
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
Back zip entry system with YKK™#10 plastic zip
Supratex knee pads, durable, lightweight & flexible
GlideSkin neck seal
Key loop on outer left leg
Print placement may differ slightly
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Zip into action with this long sleeve wetsuit for women. Part of the Swell Series, the high-performance design features a StretchFlight and thermal lining construction for immense warmth and protection. Complete with a GlideSkin neck seal to keep water out.

name: Women's Flashbomb 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Women's Flashbomb 5/4mm Hooded Chest Zip wetsuit is now equipped E6 neoprene, fast drying E6 Flash lining, and E6 Flash Lining Tape. This suit provides unparalleled stretch, warmth and comfort in and out of the water. Rip Curl's E6 neoprene is 20% lighter than E4 while providing 30% more stretch so it won't compromise your mobility and flexibility while paddling out and catching a wave. The seams are also taped with E6 Flash Lining tape for extra comfort and water seam sealing. Perfect for cold water, this suit also utilizes mesh skin panels to absorb solar rays and reduce windchill. he Flash Bomb is our top-selling women's suit in the Rip Curl lineup, and with these updated features we're sure you'll love it for its warmth, technical features, and quick-drying ability.

DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: E6
Internal Lining: E6 Flash
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2020/2021
Manufacturers Part Number: WSTYDG
PRODUCT FEATURES
Premium high stretch E6 neoprene. 20% lighter and 30% more stretch than E4
E6 Flash Lining has 20% more stretch and then E5 and is now equal to Rip Curls Ultimate stretch neoprene, now with added warmth and still fast drying
Ultimate stretch E6 Flash Lining tape for a water tight seal providing warmth and comfort
Smooth mesh skin panels that absorb solar rays and reduce wind chill
Sealed cuffs
Easy top entry system with lightweight zipper for chest zip closure

name: Women's Ninja 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
O’Neill always puts out top-of-the-line products with top-of-the-line costs, but the Women's Ninja 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit prioritizes affordability. Don’t fret; it still has O’Neill’s top features; UltraFlex neoprene, internal Ultraflex taped seams, DL FluidFlex Firewall insulation, and double super seal neck closure. Although it’s missing the beloved Technobutter, the Ultraflex provides similar flexibility with increased durability. Make sure to snag the stealthy good deal on the Ninja suite before it’s gone.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Chest: DL Fluid Flex Firewall for enhanced durability
Thigh / Butt: Dl Fluidflex Firewall for additional warmth
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: 5526
PRODUCT FEATURES
Ultraflex sleeves, entry , top shoulder, side panel and low legs for max flexibility
Internal ultraflex taped seams throughout most of the suit for better seal
F.U.Z.E. Closure (Front Upper Zip Entry)
Strategic Seamless Paddle Zones
Double Super Seal Neck
External Key Pocket with Loop
Hand-Cuff Stitch Sleeve Anchor
Krypto Knee Padz
Triple Blindstitched and Glued seams in sleeves for maximum flexibility
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

The Ninja Series offers high end quality features, exceptional durability and lasting value. Featuring UltraFlex neoprene for freedom of moment, DL Fluidflex Firewall insulation, internal Ultraflex taped seams and water tight double super seal neck closure. Clean style lines and color blocking complete this well balanced, value packed series.

name: Women's Furnace 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
To stay warm and perform your best, you need a wetsuit that's lightweight, super flexible, and built to handle the action. The Billabong 5/4 Women's Furnace Comp Series Hooded Chest Zip Full Wetsuit rises to the challenge with AIRLITE 4D exterior, a SMART foam core, and a technical Graphene interior. Reinforced with Super-flex taped seams.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: SMART Foam
Exterior Fabric: AIRLITE 4D
Interior Fabric: Graphene
Sleeves: Long
Entry System / Zip: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Materials: 70% Recycled Nylon, 19% Nylon, 11% Elastane
Model Year: 2023
MPN: ABJW200104
PRODUCT FEATURES
Recycled nylon elastane graphic stretch blend fabric
Partially recycled, premium lightweight Smart Foam, for highest thermal retention and lightweight stretch
SMART foam is made from upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps
AIRLITE 4D offers 20% more stretch
Power seam exterior seams
Machine applied interior seams with super-flex neo tape

name: Women's Swell Series 5/4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Feminine flare and high-end features make up the Roxy Women’s Swell Series 5/4/3 hooded chest zip wetsuit. The Swell is an update from the former Syncro, which has been a Cleanline Surf best-seller for years. While paddling out, feel the comfort and warmth radiate from the Eco StretchFlight neoprene and WarmFlight thermal lining. GBS glued and blind stitched seams along with xtra-stretch taping hold the suit together session after session. The unique chest zip entry completely detaches from the front of the suit, which makes for easier maneuvering in and out of the wetsuit.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4/3mm
Fabric: Eco StretchFlight
Thermal Lining: Eco sleek WarmFlight® at bust (front, sides, back) and wrist
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached Hood
Materials: 88% Recycled Polyester, 12% Elastane
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style: ERJW103127
PRODUCT FEATURES
GBS glued and blind stitched seams
Xtra-stretch taped at front, back and top legs
Water based glue used for linings
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
Chest zip entry system with PK#8 plastic zip
Supratex knee pads, durable, lightweight & flexible
GlideSkin neck seal
Key loop on outer left leg
Print placement may differ slightly
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Ride a gnarly wave when you see one with this hooded wetsuit of the Swell Series. From coast to coast, the long sleeve design offers a high-performance design with flexible StretchFlight fabric and GBS seams to prevent water entry.

name: Women's Synergy 5/4 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
For the best in performance, heat, and value, there's no beating the 5/4 Synergy Back Zip Full Wetsuit. Delivering peak flexibility without sacrificing warmth, this women's wetsuit is made with recycled PRO STRETCH! exterior and a Superlight foam core, adding seams for ultimate durability and a back zip for easy entry.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: Superlight Foam
Exterior Fabric: 100% Recycled PRO STRETCH!
Interior Fabric: Graphene and Silicone Stretch
Exterior Seams: GBS
Interior Seams: Superflex Neo tape
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Sleeves: Long
Hood: No Hood
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 10% Nylon, 10% Polyester
Model Year: 2022/2023
Style Number: ABJW100134
PRODUCT FEATURES
Best Value and Performance Option
Women's Long Sleeve Full Wetsuit
Synergy Wetsuit Series
High-stress point reinforced melco spot tape
Taped Internal Seams
Welded Seams
Glued and Blindstitched seams
Dislocating chest zip entry prevents zip failure
100% Recycled Fibers In and out
ADDITIONAL INFO

PRO STRETCH
New soft silicone stretch jersey made using 100% recycled fibers.

SMART FOAM
Superior thermal retention, made using partially recycled, Premium light weight materials. SMART Foam limestone-based with 30% recycled car tires, scrap rubber & oyster shells.

GRAPHENE
The warmth and performance of Nobel prize-winning Graphene is heat-generating material infused and combined with Silicone Stretch — 100% recycled fibers. Graphene-infused yarns warm up faster and hold heat longer.

GRAPHENE RECYCLER +
The warmth and Performance of Graphene. Infused with 100% recycled fibers lining the entire interior of the suit.

SUPERFLEX RECYCLER +
100% recycled fibers, combined with Superlight foam is lightweight, eco-friendly and provides great thermal retention with 20% increased stretch.

SUPERLIGHT FOAM
Partially recycled, upcycled car tires and neoprene scraps combine to create great thermal retention with a high-stretch combination.

SILICON STRETCH JERSEY
The ideal blend of flexibility and thermal retention - Billabong's new soft silicon stretch internal jersey is made from 100% recycled fibers and combined with an eco-friendly Superlight foam.

WELDED SEAMS
100% externally welded seams combined with Superflex neo-taped internal seams = no leaks.

SUPER-FLEX NEO TAPE
The internal machine applied Super-flex neo tape keeps the warmth in and the water out.

AQUA ALPHA
Aqua Alpha water-based nontoxic glues are used exclusively to bond Billabong wetsuit materials.

name: Women's RB2 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Women's Buell RB2 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit makes for a high-quality, eco-friendly, and affordable wetsuit. The slant zip entry provides water-tight warmth while making it easy to take on and off. The lime-stone-based Ninja Neoprene allows 30% less water absorption resulting in a quicker drying time. Buell prioritizes comfort without compromising durability with a soft and fuzzy thermal liner, external seam weld, and glued and blindstitched seams.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: Ninja
Interior Lining: Thermal Barrier (Chest & Back)
Seams: Glued & Blind-stitched
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Key Pocket: Yes
Knee Pads: Yes
Model Year: 2022
MPN: WRB20254W
PRODUCT FEATURES
Glued and blindstitched external seams with power-lite "Sizzle" seam seal on the outside
Slant Zip entry gives you one-sided water seal performance that pushes the limits of a wetsuit’s warmth potential
Easy to access and secure key pocket
Neck features smoothskin “Snake Seal”
Embossed Supratex Tuff knee pads
Internal thermal Insulation barrier on the chest and back
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

The insulated RB2 slant-zip is Buell's warmest, most water tight wetsuit built for barrels. The Slant Zip entry gives you one-sided water seal performance that pushes the limits of a wetsuit’s warmth potential.

Ninja Neoprene is the lightest, stretchiest and softest neoprene material in the water. With roughly 30% less water absorption, dries quicker and is limestone so it’s better for the environment. The suit has glued and blindstitched seams with power-lite “Sizzle” seam seal on the outside. Critical seam junctions are reinforced with seam tape for added strength. The ultimate seam seal. Liquid rubber lines the exterior seam, which, combined with the glued and blindstitched seam make the seams completely waterproof. Soft and comfortable Kevlar-like kneepads are tough on the outside, but soft and stretchy on the inside. Smooth rubber seal integrated into the cuffs prevent expansion and keep water out while maximizing comfort. Fluid rubber seal at the neck wrists and ankles help to prevent expansion while keeping water out. Toasty warm in extreme conditions!

name: Women's Seven Seas 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
The Sisstrevolution Women’s 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip wetsuit contains all the features needed in a quality cold water suit. From the flexible 100% Super Stretch Light neoprene to the toasty warm and quick drying Fever Fiber lining, this suit quickly zaps the chill of sub 50F water temperatures. The Super Stretch Neo 2.0 Tape provides optimal warmth and maximum paddling flexibility. With sustainability in mind, the suit is produced with dope-dyed fabric and manufactured in Bluesign-approved mills.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: 100% Super Stretch Light limestone based
Internal Lining: Fever Fiber
Legs Lining: Eco Fiber
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached Hood
Key Pocket: Key Cord
Knee Pads: Yes
Materials: 80% Neoprene, 20% Nylon
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturer's Part Number: GNMS54HC
PRODUCT FEATURES
100% Super Stretch
Sisstr's super stretch Neo 2.0 tape allows for maximum seam sealing have unrestricted stretch and comfort
Triple glued, double blind stitched seams
Liquid taped cuffs, seals to prevent flushing
SUPRATEX knee pads are abrasion resistant for flexibility and strength
Glideskin on the neck seals to skin to prevent flushing
Dope Dyed Fabric
MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION

WARMTH & STRETCH | Everything you need in a wetsuit and nothing you don't. 100% Super stretch Japanese limestone based neoprene - lighter. warmer. softer. stretchier. easier to put on and take off. Allows for more freedom of movement with Fever Fiber lining insulates heat and dries fast. Dope Dyed Fabric- A softer eco-friendly and anti-fade made by Bluesign approved mills. AquaA eco-friendly water-based lamination is completely solvent free with no harmful chemicals.

name: Women's Ultra Hot Combo 5/4 Hooded Wetsuit
description:
If you're a lady who struggles with finding a hooded wetsuit that fits properly in the shoulders, chest, and neck, this is for you. Tried and true in extreme conditions, the Hotline Women's Ultra Hot Combo 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit is designed with top of the line materials for the greatest comfort and highest degree of warmth. The UHC includes a built-in drawstring hood and full shoulder-to-shoulder zipper for quick entry and exit when it's frigid. A freeze-free inner panel offers extra protection in water from 32 to 52 degrees. Never miss another day of perfect icy waves!

*Due to variable shipments from Hotline Wetsuits, logo colors may vary from the images shown here.

DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: Super Stretch
Internal Lining: Thermal
Seams: Sealed/Taped
Zipper: Shoulder to Shoulder Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturers Part Number: WH5401
PRODUCT FEATURES
Super stretch "like butter" neoprene on entry panel, upper arm, & lower torso
Nylon blend neoprene on core, lower arm, & lower leg for maximum warmth and protection
Shoulder-to-shoulder zipper
Anatomically correct, heavy-duty hood with drawstring
Triple-glued, blind stitched, and taped seams
Kevlar blend knee pads with extra stretch
Detachable key ring in entry panel

name: Women's Dawn Patrol 5/3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description:
Rip Curl's Women's Dawn Patrol 5/3 Back Zip Wetsuit is the ideal choice for performance-driven surfers. Sturdy and reliable, yet designed to provide exceptional warmth through its E5 Flash Lining and E5 neoprene - all of which are found in the company’s top-end offerings. Internally taped seams provide warmth and add durability. In addition, the back zip entry makes for a quick entry and exit. Incredible value combined with unbeatable quality makes this wetsuit a fantastic investment.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/3mm
Neoprene: E5
Internal Lining: E5 Flash Lining / E4 Thermo Lining
Seams: Sealed / Taped
Entry System / Zipper: Back Zip
Hood: No Hood
Knee Pads: Yes
Model Year: 2022/2023
MPN: WSM9DS
PRODUCT FEATURES
E5 Flash Lining Front & Back Panel
E5 Flash Lining Tape
E5 Tape
E4 Thermo Lining
Batwing System
MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION

Rip Curl's Women's Dawn Patrol 5/3 Back Zip Wetsuit offers performance and warmth along with durability and great value. This wetsuit has many of the high-end features you will find in our Ultimate suits including E5 Flash Lining, E5 neoprene and E4 Thermo lining.

name: Women's RB2 5/4 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit - 2020
description:
Cleanline Staff
Sarah O Says:

"The RB2 “Beast Mode” is a true gem in the ladies wetsuit market. It has all the features necessary for a comfortable, warm, and durable wetsuit with it’s true to size fit. Overall, the wrists and ankles have a solid snug fit to them. The fuzzy feeling liner is not only comfortable but also adds warmth to the suit along with the sizzle seam seal which blocks out water from seeping in the wetsuit. The 5/4mm is the ideal thickness for water temps ranging from 45-55 F. With all of these high end features you can’t beat the price!"

Buells ultimate year round wetsuit, RB2, is their warmest most watertight wetsuit yet. In order to push the barriers of this wetsuit's warmth potential "Ninja Neoprene" is used in combination with an internal thermal insulation barrier. The slant zip entry gives you a one-sided water seal to lock out the cold water, while the seams are glued and blind stitched with power-lite "Sizzle" seam seal on the outside. The RB2 is built for endless barrels.

DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4mm
Neoprene: Ninja
Internal Lining: Thermal Barrier
Seams: Glued/Blindstitched
Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Model Year: 2020
Manufacturers Part Number:
PRODUCT FEATURES
Buell's own Ninja Neoprene
Glued and blind stitched seams with power-lite “Sizzle” seam seal on the outside
Slant Zip entry gives you one-sided water seal performance
Easy to access and secure Key Pocket
Embossed Supratex Tuff knee pads
Chest and Back internal thermal insulation barrier

name: Women's Syncro 5/4/3 Hooded Chest Zip Wetsuit
description:
Keep the bite off as temperatures drop with our full-length 5/4/3mm Syncro wetsuit, cut from recycled StretchFlight 2 neoprene and sewn together using flexible and durable triple GBS seams with StretchFlight tape for a water-tight finish. The chest zip closure is less likely to produce rashes for added comfort. While you stay warm and cozy thanks to the WarmFlight® thermal fleece lining, you'll be able to surf the cold days away.

PRODUCT DETAILS
Thickness: 5/4/3mm
Neoprene: StretchFlight 2
Internal Lining: WarmFlight
Seams: Glued & Blindstitched
Entry System / Zipper: Chest Zip
Hood: Attached
Knee Pads: Supertex
Model Year: 2021/2022
Manufacturer's Part Number: ERJW203011
PRODUCT FEATURES
Temperature: 8-12°c / 46 54°f
Fabrics: StretchFlight 2 neoprene for increased warmth and comfort without sacrificing flexibility
24% less CO2 emissions per wetsuit
Limestone-derivate eco-friendly neoprene made from scrap rubber tires and Bluesign® certified
Thermal smoothie: Back
Thermal lining: WarmFlight® thermal fleece lining keeps body heat in and water out [chest, sides and back]
Seams: Triple glued and blind stitched [GBS] seams reduce sew-throughs and water entry
Inside taping:StretchFlight tapes black on front, back and top legs
Print placement may differ slightly
Water-based glue used for lamination
Recycled polyester and nylon used for linings
This is a guide only: Weather, sensitivity to the cold and conditions on your local break will affect temperatures and choice of equipment
Entry system: Chest zip entry system with SALMI 05 zip
Supratex knee pads
Glideskin neck seal
